DOC.brief_summary: A single center , single dose , open-label , randomize , 3-period , 6-sequence , crossover study conduct normal healthy subject evaluate effect high- low-fat meal pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , bioavailability ( BA ) , safety COV155 .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic , Bioavailability , Safety Study COV155 Administered Healthy Subjects Under Fed Fasted Conditions
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males and/or nonpregnant , nonlactating postmenopausal female , 18 55 year age body mass index ≥ 19 ≤ 30 kg/m2 . 2 . All subject biologically capable child must agree commit use acceptable method ( ) birth control . 1 . ECG abnormalities lab value great 2 time upper limit normal . 2 . Positive test result human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C ( IgG ) . 3 . Positive urine test result drug abuse history drug/alcohol abuse . 4 . Use marijuana , illicit drug nicotinecontaining product . 5 . Donated significant loss whole blood . 6 . Taken prescription nonprescription drug , vitamin , mineral , dietary/herbal supplement . 7 . History abdominal and/or pelvic surgery , cholecystectomy , gastric bypass gastric band surgery , cardiothoracic surgery . 8 . History anxiety , tension , agitation , psychiatric disorder , psychosis , depression require hospitalization , psychotherapy , and/or medication . 9 . History acute chronic gastrointestinal disease condition may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion study treatment . 10 .
